description: Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
full_summary:
### Packaging Items
---
**Procurement Notice Reference:** PW-23-01028693  
**Tender Solicitation Number:** W8486-217437/B  
**Publication Date:** 2023-03-03
**Tender Closing Date:**  2023-03-27T14:00:00  
**Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)

The Department of National Defence requires a contract for the procurement of packaging items. This solicitation is open to qualified suppliers under the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and several other international trade agreements.

The required packaging items include:

* Cartons, crates, and boxes for shipping
* Intermediate packaging materials

The delivery locations are:

* Canadian Forces Supply Depot (CFSD) in Montreal, Quebec
* CFSD in Edmonton, Alberta

Bidders who propose an equivalent or substitute product must provide the brand name, model or part number, and NCAGE. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers regarding the procurement.

Documents related to this solicitation can be accessed on the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell website.

**Packaging Items Details:**

| Item   | Description.pub        | NSN     | Unit of Issue | Delivery Location |
| :----- | :--------------------- | :------ | :------------- | :---------------- |
| 1      | BOX                    | 8155    | EA             | CFSD Montreal     |
| 2      | BOX                    | 8115    | EA             | CFSD Montreal     |
| 3      | PLASTIC BAG             | 8105    | EA             | CFSD Montreal     |
| 4      | BOX                    | 8115    | EA             | CFSD Montreal     |
| 5      | BOX                    | 8155    | EA             | CFSD Edmonton     |
| 6      | BOX                    | 8115    | EA             | CFSD Edmonton     |
| 7      | PLASTIC BAG             | 8105    | EA             | CFSD Edmonton     |
| 8      | BOX                    | 8115    | EA             | CFSD Edmonton     |

Contact information:

* Name: Paige Morris
* Email: [paige.morris@forces.gc.ca](mailto:paige.morris@forces.gc.ca)
